## R packages
- [Distance](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/Distance/index.html) distance sampling analysis
  - [Github repository for `Distance` {{<fa brands github>}}](https://github.com/DistanceDevelopment/Distance)
- [mrds](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/mrds/index.html) detection function modelling engine (used by `Distance`)
  - [Github repository for `mrds` {{<fa brands github>}}](https://github.com/DistanceDevelopment/mrds)
- [dssd](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/dssd/index.html) survey design engine
  - [Github repository for `dssd` {{<fa brands github>}}](https://github.com/DistanceDevelopment/dssd)
- [dsims](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/dsims/index.html) simulation of distance sampling surveys
  - [Github repository for `dsims` {{<fa brands github>}}](https://github.com/DistanceDevelopment/dsims)
